entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:42 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 8:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
